original_text: Whenever the king went to the Lord’s temple, the guards bore the shields, and afterward they returned them to the guardroom.
korean_text: 왕이 여호와의 성전에 들어갈 때마다 시위하는 자가 그 방패를 들고 갔다가 시위소로 도로 가져갔더라

sentences.original_text: Whenever the king went to the Lord's temple,
and afterward they returned them to the guardroom.
